patthana16.47:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.47:1.1_1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.47:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.47:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
